will be the Mountain View Internet juggernaut's new CEO starting April 4, and current CEO Eric Schmidt will be executive chairman, Eric Schmidt revealed in a post today on Google's blog. Co-founder Sergey Brin , meanwhile, has decided to devote his time and energy to strategic projects, in particular working on new products. His title will be co-founder. He's an innovator and entrepreneur to the core, and this role suits him perfectly, Eric Schmidt said. "As Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated," Eric Schmidt wrote. Sergio Marchionne said Chrysler remains grateful for the bailouts and noted that no other parties were willing to assist in Chrysler's recovery. The two governments levied interest rates that, although appropriate at the time, are above current market conditions, he continued.
